description: Profound sense of isolation and disconnection from others
actor_description: Even surrounded by people, I feel utterly alone. Like I am behind glass, watching but never quite touching.
description_text: {actor} seems to draw inward, their posture closed and their attention turned somewhere far away from the present moment.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: The space around {actor} feels strangely quiet, as if sound itself keeps its distance.
